mdRecord.dcterms:title: Legacy Memorandum: Freight Rail Industry and Surface Transportation Board
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The "Legacy Memorandum: Freight Rail Industry and Surface Transportation Board" details Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller's work on national rail policy as it relates to the Surface Transportation Board (STB), captive shippers, and the freight rail industry.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Railroads
RailroadsFreightUnited States
Rockefeller, John D, IV (John Davison), 1937
